Description_lang: Increases an enemy's physical damage done by $s1%, but increases its physical damage taken by $s2% for $d. Cursed enemies will ignore fear effects and refuse to flee from combat. |cFF8282FFCurses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.|r
AuraDescription_lang: Physical damage dealt increased by $s1%.Physical damage taken increased by $s2%.Ignoring fear effects.
